named-query.name: SECURITY-GET-USERID
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Signon a WHERE a.uuid=:UUID and a.applicationId=:APPLICATION_ID

named-query.name: SECURITY-GET-GROUPASSIGNMENT
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM UserGroupAssignment a WHERE a.userId=:USER_ID

named-query.name: SECURITY-GET-FUNCTIONASSIGNMENT
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ApplicationMenuAssignment a WHERE a.groupId IN :LIST_GROUP_ID

named-query.name: SECURITY-GET-FUNCTIONMEU
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM ApplicationMenu a left outer join a.pageDefinition pg WHERE a.status=:STATUS AND a.id IN :LIST_FUNCTION_ID ORDER BY a.treeLevelPosition asc , a.siblingOrder asc , a.id ASC

named-query.name: SECURITY-LOGIN-GET-USERID
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM User a WHERE a.userCode=:USERNAME

named-query.name: SECURITY-LOGIN-CHECK-SIGNON
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Signon a WHERE a.userId=:USER_ID

named-query.name: SECURITY-LOGIN-GET-APPLICATION
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Application a WHERE a.id=:APPLICATION_ID

named-query.name: SECURITY-LOGIN-CHECK-PASSWORD
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM UserPassword a WHERE a.userId=:USER_ID ORDER BY a.id DESC
